doc.abstracts: This situational analysis of basic sanitation services in the Cajamarca region is based on the 'learn by doing' methodology, which has comprised the following activities: preparing the instruments for gathering information; collection of information based on the review of secondary sources related to total sanitation; consultations with regional entities involved in these services; the First Regional Planning Workshop; fieldwork, interviews and surveys; and preparation of local and regional reports. The report contains the following sections: general characteristics of the region; the current sanitation situation in the region; principal problems or difficulties that exist in the sector for each of the analyzed services; steps that have been taken to resolve the problems; problems in order of priority.
